basics.name: Pablo Valenzuela
basics.label: IT/Digital Transformation and AI Consultant. Diploma in Project Management from the University of the University of Chile (PUC)
basics.summary: Software Engineer with over 14 years of experience, a Diploma in Project Management from the PUC(Puerto Rico University of Chile), attractive technical and executive experience as Founder/CTO of a Chilean startup, Project Manager, IT Reporter, Senior Software Engineer, and a broad perspective that allows him to contribute, innovate, and solve problems. He created the first MVP for his startup, managing everything from the product backlog and programming to the product's production deployment.

work.name: EHAC Group, Chile. S.A
work.position: Senior Full Stack Engineer, for project
work.summary: In 7 months I developed a modular ERP APP hosted on AWS, offering high performance with microservices and horizontal scalability. (finished project). Advised on migration to Cloud Computing with AWS and I created an AWS budget, I also raised requirements in conjunction with Product Owners, Uses Case, User Stories and was carried out Product backlog, sprint and deadlines implementing Scrum and PMI. Technology Stack: JavaScript, Python, React, Django, API REST, WebSockets, Docker, Kubernetes, Bootstrap, Git and AWS (Lambda, Route53, S3, RDS and Beanstalk).

work.name: Transport Casablanca S.A
work.position: Senior Full Stack Engineer, for project
work.summary: In 2 months I developed an App with CRM modules for managing leads and notifications via email to operations area of ​​requirements from the corporate web channel (project completed). I advised on the adoption of AWS, created an AWS budget and raised requirements with Product Owner(KAM) through User Stories, product backlog, sprint and defining deadlines Using Scrum and PMI. Technology Stack: React, Python, Django, JavaScript, DRF, Git and AWS (Serverless, Ruta53, S3, RDS, Docker and EC2).

work.name: Ecoinput StartUp, Chile
work.position: Founder, Senior Software Engineer, CTO and part time Technology Advisor
work.summary: I created an agile cell in 2 months and aligned with the business model and for the development of the first MVP. I was responsible for all stages of the lifecycle, from requirements gathering to MVP deadline in production within 3 months. I defined schedule and critical path. Additional projects were the development of App Arturito Bot in 2 months in order to improve Ecoinput customer request SLAs. Technology Stack: Python, JavaScript, React, Django, DRF, WebSockets, Git and AWS (Route53, S3, RDS, Beanstalk and EC2), Docker and Kubernetes.

work.name: Ripley Bank, Chile
work.summary: I was responsible for setting up an insourcing cell in 3 months for the Bank's Innovation Management and for resolve Product Owner requirements for financial products and back-office. Managed portfolio of 8 projects related to business lines, I created a project schedule, critical routes to optimize related resources and achieve deadlines. Evolutionary issues were resolved according to the deadline agreed with Product Owners and were successfully implemented. good-practices Scrum for managing User Stories, Backlog and Sprints. Timely response and organized requests. It is possible to work in harmony with insourcing and outsourcing cells during the development of evolutionary of Home Banking and BackOffice. Technology Stack: Jira, Confluence, DevOps(CI/CD), Java, Jenkins, JEE, Spring Boot, SOA, DDD, Angular and Oracle DB.

work.name: Tessi Group, Chile
work.summary: I formed an agile cell in 2 months and with the necessary skills for the Banco BBVA Colombia client, I coordinated the entire life cycle of the Bank's Business Application, from gathering requirements with Product Owners to managing the roadmap, backlog and deadlines using Scrum and PMI best practices. Technologies used: Oracle WebLogic, DevOps/DDD, Kafka, BPM, Java/JEE, Angular/React, Jira/Confluence, Node.JS and HTML5.

work.name: CMF (Commission for the Financial Market of Chile)
work.summary: I developed the evolutionary ones for the institutional Intranet and improvements to the SBIF API, I developed new components for purchasing and performance evaluation modules. I improved requirements gathering by implementing Scrum user stories, developed deliverable prototypes for the Product Owner and managed a portfolio of 3 technological projects. Technologies used: Java EE/Oracle Weblogic, Jboss, HTML5, Angular and Node.JS.

work.name: DIPRES - Chilean Ministry of Finance
work.summary: I developed the evolutions of the SIGFE 2 System and solved incidents reported in modules and collected requirements in user stories. Technologies used: Java JEE/SOA Oracle Web Services, Angular, DDD, DevOps, Spring Framework and Eclipse IDE.

work.name: The Andes, Chile
work.position: Part time IT Architect Java/Oracle/SOA Weblogic and WAS
work.summary: I was responsible for creating a technical report to suggest to the Development Engineer team a technological stack and good SOA practices to implement in business applications. I successfully managed to apply my knowledge of SOA and Oracle technologies previously gained as an IT Relator.

work.name: Linux Latin America, Chile
work.summary: I was a Rapporteur of courses to develop applications using Java, Oracle middleware, JEE, SOA, WebLogic, IBM WAS, enterprise application architecture and project management with Scrum. I managed to successfully complete all the courses taught at the Consultancy. Technologies used: Java, JEE, Oracle middleware, SOA, WebLogic and IBM WAS.

work.name: CMP Trainings, Chile
work.summary: I was Java/Oracle Advisor for the critical applications infrastructure project, Oracle WebLogic, Oracle DB, JSE/EE rapporteur, definition of the business domain model for the database and implementation of Scrum. I successfully advised my client before implementing an ERP system, promptly reporting the risks detected in the preliminary pre-project report.

work.name: Isamédica Clinic, Chile
work.summary: I developed a statistical management software project, defined a functional test plan, database standardization, documentation and control with Jira. I developed Web Application for statistical queries of the outpatient service, in parallel reports were created with SQL Views for the Clinical project for management. Technologies used: Oracle MySql, Microsoft Sql Server, SQL, HTML 5 and Web API.

work.name: Conicyt, Chile
work.summary: I developed two Software Projects (MVP) for Conicyt funding contests in Chile and respecting the initial schedule of 4 months until the pivot was put into production. Technologies used: MySQL, OOP, DDD, SOLID, HTML5 and Ruby on Rails.

work.name: Metalfue, Contractor at Codelco Chile
work.summary: I developed the Corporate Website, requirements gathering, creation of the Schedule, Hosting provider budget, VPS, deliverables, white equipment, production transition and documentation. Technologies used: Angular, Bootstrap, JavaScript, HTML5 and MySql.
